Class SeleniumWSelectWebElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element.SeleniumWComponentWebElement

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext, org.openqa.selenium.TakesScreenshot, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement

    public class SeleniumWSelectWebElement
extends SeleniumWComponentInputWebElement
    Selenium WebElement class representing a WSelect.

    1.2.0
    Author:
    Joshua Barclay, Mark Reeves
